message.body: I got a B in archaeology!!!!!!!!!!!
Congrats!!
Meow. What are you going to do?
Also, I was talking to my accupressurist about you and she was giving me all sorts of advice on the classes you should take
Ooooooo really?!?!
Awesome!
You and the prof?
Oh I sent my professor the wrong copy of my final paper. It ws unfinished.
Oh no! What happened? You sent the right one I presume?
I'm STILL putzing around on my orchestra paper
Maybe he can write my grad school letter of recommendation
Scheme scheme scheme
No I just realized it when he returned it graded. I must not have saved the finished copy. He noted that it was unfinished, but strong ideas. And have me a B+ WTF?!?!?!?
And this is the prof who gave me Cs all semester
He can get you into penn no problem!!
Lol
Weird
But good!!!
Maybe you weren't slacking ENOUGH
Where did u find your grades?
I know, haha, my work reeked of effort. He sent our grades through email, but you can find them on moodle
But I think professors have until the third to get them in
Word
Ooo I got a 92 in bio lab! I think that's an improvement!
Hopefully I didn't do too bad in the class...lab is supposed to be a boost
That's great
I think we are going to be ok at this school!!
I think so too lol :)
Lets keep working the charm though
It's a good look on us
Yeah, and keep working the gym.
Butts look good on us
Amen
We are fully indoctrinated, the Stockholm syndrome is in effect
And how!
Jay!!
You crazy thing you!!
It's been like 2 months since I've had a killer hookup. That's almost my longest dry spell of the decade!
Ok, I'm so lame I'll stop talking about it :D
Hahaha, completely understandable! Don't worry, no judgement ; )
I know, you're the best at non-judgement
I played a really awesome wingman to my sister yesterday too so I feel no guilt over ditching my family for sex :)
Hahahahaha you are really good at making articulate, sharp and logical judgements. You killed it in seminars.
That's funny, because in practice I judge so so so much
Ah seminar...(cue nostalgia)
Oh, sigh. My apt for logic makes me a hard and icy person to date, haha
Yeah, that keeps them coming back haha. We are enjoying ourselves. We got all dressed up and went to a friends wedding at magic gardens last night!
Ooooooo! That sounds lovely! Was it magical?
It was! So much champagne!
Nice!
Ugh..the photographer took some but I didn't. My dress was cuuuute too. How is the hook up?
Sad
I just kept thinking of how I love him and it made me sad. Otherwise great
A sad hook up : (
Are you interested in Galavanting around the city tomorrow?
I'm bored
Haha awe happy new year I'm sorry
Happy new year, now there are fireworks on the roof !
Nice!
There's singing and smoking and cookies and markers and drunk in my living room
That sounds so wonderful!!
Happy New Year!
Year of better luck, Bryn Mawr awesomeness, lesbian reservists and awesome ass thesis'
I love all of that! This is our year, I can feel it.
I heart bathroom photos!!!
How was two street?
Didn't make it over
I'm so thoroughly brainwashed, I miss school
Haha
Lol me too a little
Not a lot
Haha..it just started today. I think I'm excited about the gym. How was new yearz?
It was wild!
Well my party was chill
OMG that reminds me that there's booze left
Awesome
I'm so happy that most nights end in singing in my party life
Hahaha awwww you?!!
I'm sorry
That's just mine, my artsy friends all wanted to draw
But it was great to bring in the new year with friends and music and stickers!
Yeah my party was chill too, but still someone threw up everywhere...somehow
Stickers?!?!, like Lisa frank?
No of course not!! I drank a lot of champagne, but held my own. I had a lot of fun once we started shooting bottle rockets
Hahahah
That sounds fun!
I was totally grumpy about jay all day yesterday though. And started my day drunk and just kept drinking.
I'm RARELY a grumpy drunk so that wasn't a good sign
I just kept looking at all of the couples I was with and thinking about how he was cuddling with his Ex watching movies
Yes! I'm throwing them up today
Hahahahaha
These days
So, yep. That's my crazy plan. Nothing like a good cry on the kitchen floor to make one come up with such tomfoolery. Though subtract cry on floor and add drink a lot and run around
I admire your moxie, it demonstrates your brilliance!
I just spent one hundred dlars at whole foods and a good portion of it was smoked meats.
Hahahahaha nice!!!
Yummmm
Where do you find your grades? I still don't have any!
Curse!
Hmmm. I assumed in the same place. I think today was the day they had to be submitted
Maybe there is a delay in posting them?
By same place u meant VBM unofficial transcript page? Because aside from Moodle that's where I was looking. Oof I'm so excited for gym
I meant moodle under grades. I really want to know how I did. Arch was such a beautiful surprise
￼I have one saved especially for each of you. This may be the most self control I've ever exhibited in my 27+ years in this mortal coil.
Yes!!!! That's awesome!
I was attempting to engage you, jay and I in a group text. Fail
Jay told me forced group texts are awkward
Awesome, thanks for hopping aboard
We need to day drink soon. And day swim and run!
He thinks polyamory is awkward, wht does he know??
Lol!!! Right? And does he? He's pretty good at it
Thanks Meg. It's mostly through incredible strength, grace and fortitude.
Point to Meg for engaging in awkward forced group text convo. Zero points for Jay.
Haha..true! Maybe open polyamory?
False. I just had Chinese food, wasabi peas, a cereal bar and gushers. It's more a testament to my fortitude than anything.
And thank you Jay for rallying to said AGTC. I'm really pleased with everyone's performance here today.
Hahahahaha thanks for hopping onto that
Did you make a wish?
There are in fact a myriad of gel filled foods. Gushers are just the tip of the iceberg
Good work team
I believe so
￼The Protaghonest
Ooo I already have 2 Instagram fans! Yay!
I had a very non sad jay night! Huzzah! What are you up to tomorrow? Lija and I are going to a gay dance party
Yes!!! Where is it? I have no plans
The bike stop in the gayborhood
Do u have any grades yet?
Nope! Brigid said it may be another week or so
I got ANOTHER jay sleepover!!!!
Wow! You are killin it! It's the new street art persona.
Did you get the email? Grades are going up!
For a school with a policy about not talking about grades, we talk about grades ALOT
Lol I know!
I did fine : )
Good job!!!!!!!! Woohoo!
Dude I just had a really stressful interview with the inquirer
I'm afraid of getting NY timesd again
What?
Yerp
Haha oh no!
Are u hangin tonight? I can tell u aboot it Lata
I'm not doing anymore press in my career
Now that esem worked out, I will have to tell yu about how terrible I did at the end
Lol! To the press txt
Terrible at the end of Esem?
Ugh I'm just a press whore I can't help it
I'm getting my picture taken on the steps of CCP again too....what is wrong with me?
I was trying to persuade them to go to the library
Oooo I did fine too!
Woohoo!
Yes! We are great!
Heading to the bike stop now!
I fell asleep at like nine! How was dance party?
Fun! I didn't realize I knew so many lesbians
Although Lija kept cock blocking me everytime I tried to talk to someone. ERRRY TIME!
However, it was still a lot of fun!
Whattttt?!?!!!
Yea
She's trying to out lesbian you?
Hahahahaha
Jay and I were trying to figure out the other day if she has a crush on me or is in competition with me.
She's just kind of THAT FRIEND that needs to be the center of your attention the whole time
Probably a mix of both?
She gets unnecessarily mad for a friend
Yea...that was Jays theory. My theory was that even Lija doesn't know. I've just come to expect it at this point it's so consistent.
Yea, it's true. I'm not usually one to avoid confrontation but I've been really adamantly avoiding this particular convo.
No I don't think she's trying to be either
Yeah, I would agree that she doesn't realize
I don't think she is trying to be shitty, she probably just gets overwhelmed with emotions
Well, it seems so suppressed that there isn't much to tAlk about.
I used to be really emotional before I was an aloof bitch
It seems to be a default that has evolved in her/our relationship. And true. There really isn't much to talk about
Hahahaha hahahaha
How did you manage to become an aloof bitch?!!
Teach me your ways!!!!
I've= over
Hahahahahagahsh
Shit
I guess I've got to feel all I can now!
Holy cow! Did you were that to the dance party?
I should have. DAMN YOU 20/20 HINDSIGHT!
It's always so clear!
When does your enquirer article come out?
Next week sometime
I'm scrrrd! But the photoshoot was awesome
I just hung out with the photographer for an hour and walked around Philly looking for street art!
I probably will look and sound like a total tool but I'm getting used to that
Haha I think we already did!
I can now add 46 year old married jersey women to my list of strange and wonderful dates
That comes with the territory. Are you going to go on a date with the photographer? ; )
Hahahahahahahahaha
College is a time of exploration
What are you up to today?
Wanna brunch?
Someone in south Philly is having a birthday brunch, I was invited and encouraged to bring a friend
Ugh I just woke up! I love brunch, but I'm hanging with Ella Bella today
Have fun!
You too!
Where are u going?
I may not go actually. My Gramma is dying so I'm going to head to BK & snag a ride home with my cousins
How has your weekend been? Are you still high off that 3.4?!
Yikes, I'm sorry. How long are you going for? When is your externship?
Tomorrow, not happening now
Poop
Please excuse my crassness
Oh no. I'm sorry taj, that is really sad
Lol!
Poop sums it up
My night was really weird too. I kind of can't wait to dish about it. Juicy gossip keeps this baloon afloat!!
More details once I hit the station :)
Yes!
So I heard about my Grandmother yesterday morning. Jay stopped over to Kim's to give me a hug & afterward Lija & got trashed on margaritas.

Upon getting back to Kim's I pass out. Lija crawls into bed with popcorn & Netflix waking me up. It was cute. I check my phone and see that Jay is having a crappy night. I want to see him before I have to go home and wait out my grandmas death so I ask Li
She sort of complains and I sit in silence for a while contemplating my mode of persuasion.
Eventually I ask if she wants to talk about it but she is either asleep or feigning.
Omg

I send her a text telling her that the reason I started dating Jay/others was because I was falling for her but didn't want to fuck up our friendship...and that I wanted to see jay once more before going home.
Lija remains asleep
Jay comes over.

He's a drunk mess. He just got out of a huge fight with Katie. She proceeds to send him 40 texts before his phone dies. He doesn't read them. We cuddle. He tells me he loves me. We share stories of our day and fall asleep. He's still notably stressed over
Oh my god this is crazy

In the morning he tells me he loves me again but he's visibly elsewhere. We acknowledge that we both have our minds on the people we are upsetting at the moment by being together. He goes home to deal with Katie. I pop into the yoga room to say goodbye to
Neither of us speak of the text.
THE END (?)
I feel bad that I even said anything to Lija. In hindsight it didn't seem necessary but at the time I was hoping to stoke a conversation
Well you have been wanting to talk about it, so it's not fair that you aren't allowed to because she won't
It's not ok to treat your friends unfairly because they are your friends and they will love you unconditionally
Forty texts!
Right!!?
(To the 40 texts). They were long ones too!
I'm sort of glad to be getting out of town! Even if not to DC
Thx for listening to this weird tale and providing wise feedback :) as ever
Wait. Who was the unfair friend

Hahaha...she is the unfair friend. If you were in a relationship with her and she refused to talk about major barriers in your relationship, it would be considered effed up, being friends makes it no different.
I'm glad u are getting out too. I'm sorry it's bc of ur grandmother
How are you doing?
Good, tired. Postponed travel plans til tomorrow, grams gotten worse
Or passed...I haven't checked in
But pretty good all things considered! I'm prob going to get an early nights sleep for the purposes of more enjoyable travel tomorrow
Yeah, it sounds like u need it. Let me know when you get back we will have boozy brunch
Oh yes! One of my favorite combinations!
Mine too! It's where you get coffee and alcohol at the same time!
And pancakes eggs fruit yogurt and bacon!
Do you know when we get the oshur scholarship by any chance? The credit is on our bills
Really? Um tomorrow please?
Oh sweet sweet bacon
They dangle money over our heads a lot
Right?!
I'm into it
I'll slut it up for that bryn Mawr cash
￼Hoppy lil Hudson
So pretty! Are you there?
Yes! The train goes all the way up the Hudson :)
That's so great!
It is really gorgeous :) good job Amtrak
Yeah, that makes up for all of the times there was vomit on my emergency exit instructions
Hahahahaha ew
Want to do a dirty girl mud run? There's one in Philly in June
￼My mother and I attended a NIN concert together, when I was a gay boy
Do you want to do Saturday or Sunday?
(For the tough mudder)
It's so cute that you saw NIN with your mom!
Saturday or Sunday?
The tough mudder is on June 1st & 2nd
Oooo..ok. I was looking at the dirty girl mud run. Its like the 22 or 23. Lets do both!
Ooooo ok let me check it out! Yay! Goals are exciting!
Yes, they are! It will give purpose to our gym time.
How is your grandmother?
She passed peacefully yesterday morning. I'm getting ready for the wake.
Everyone's doing pretty well with it thankfully. We all have good/sick senses of humor
I'm sorry, at least she isn't suffering any more. That sounds like my family. Bunch of sick fucks ; )
Lol and how!
